name: hugo-toolbox
description: Small CLI wrapper for common Hugo helper tools (update lastmod, clean cache, SFTP sync).

scripts.r:patch: npm run build:noop && npm version patch && git push && git push --tags && npm publish --access public
scripts.r:minor: npm run build:noop && npm version minor && git push && git push --tags && npm publish --access public
scripts.r:major: npm run build:noop && npm version major && git push && git push --tags && npm publish --access public
scripts.release:patch: npm run switch:prod && git add . && git commit -m "bump versions" && git pull --rebase && git push && npm run r:patch && npm run switch:dev
scripts.release:minor: npm run switch:prod && git add . && git commit -m "bump versions" && git pull --rebase && git push && npm run r:minor && npm run switch:dev
scripts.release:major-old: npm run switch:prod && git add . && git commit -m "bump version" && git pull --rebase && git push && npm run r:major && npm run switch:dev
scripts.release:major: npm run switch:prod && git pull --rebase && git add . && git commit -m "sidecars - breaking change in sync" && npm run r:major && npm run switch:dev

author: Carsten Nichte
